name: Oorwin
description: Oorwin, built on nearly a decade of research, revolutionizes recruiting, hiring, and customer experience with its user-friendly, technology-driven platform. It enables seamless operation across geographies and remote work landscapes. Serving hundreds of customers in the US, UK, Singapore, and India, our mission is to leverage emerging technologies to enhance productivity, user experience, and business efficiency, ensuring top customer satisfaction.
features: 45% Reduction in the cost of hiring
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: AI-Powered Talent Intelligence
ShortDescription: Oorwin’s platform is used to manage your entire Talent Intelligence lifecycle.

Highlights.name: Talent Acquisition
Highlights.description: Readily source and screen candidates with the right fit using intelligent candidate matching and ranking.

Highlights.name: AI-Powered Talent CRM
Highlights.description: Enable sales and Recruiting team to build , track and engage pipelines of qualified prospects and candidates.

Highlights.name: AI Enabled Recruitment
Highlights.description: Boost internal or external recruiter productivity and effectiveness, significantly reducing time-to-hire.

enhanced_description: Oorwin is an AI-powered talent intelligence platform designed to manage the entire talent intelligence lifecycle. Built on nearly a decade of research, it revolutionizes recruiting, hiring, and customer experience through its user-friendly, technology-driven platform. Oorwin enables seamless operation across geographies and remote work environments, serving hundreds of customers globally in the US, UK, Singapore, and India. It leverages emerging technologies to enhance productivity, user experience, and business efficiency, focusing on boosting internal and external recruiter productivity, significantly reducing time-to-hire, and sourcing more qualified candidates.
key_use_cases: Building, tracking, and engaging pipelines of qualified prospects and candidates
Improving customer experience related to recruiting/hiring
competitive_advantages: 45% Reduction in the cost of hiring
Seamless operation across geographies and remote work landscapes
AI-Powered Talent CRM for pipeline management
roi_benefits: 45% Reduction in the cost of hiring
